EmailTemplate.name: Revision Form Received
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for submitting your Property Website Revision Form!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for filling out the property website revision form. Our team is working on the updates. Please allow for 1-2 business days to get the updated preview website back to you.
Best,
Self Serve Property Websites Luxury Presence Phone: (310) 955-1077 Email: support@luxurypresence.com
